items.description: Pertains to the inclusion of fecal matter or the expelling of fecal matter in any form in the sexual context of an RP.

items.name: Scat Torture
items.description: The act of using fecal matter or the act of expelling fecal matter to abuse another character who is unwilling or uninterested in taking part in such actions, or being the recipient of such.

items.name: Soiling
items.description: The act of "fecal soiling" in one's underwear, pants or clothes, or having another character perform such actions.

items.name: Swallowing Feces
items.description: Engaging in an RP in which a character will orally consume fecal matter.

items.name: Swallowing Urine
items.description: Engaging in an RP in which a character will orally consume urine.

items.name: Watersports
items.description: Pertains to the inclusion of urine, or the expelling of urine, in any form, in the sexual context of an RP.

items.name: Wetting
items.description: The act of urinating in one's underwear, pants or clothes, or having another character urinate onto a person who is clothed to any degree.
